title: An introduction to Research Methods (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Ben Hewitson from the allsociology:take 1 podcast about research methods. Ben explains the difference between primary and secondary research, qualitative and quantitative data and those all important terms - Validity, Reliability and Representativeness.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
